name: Bill Sorro Housing Program
description: Bill Sorro Housing Program (BiSHoP) is dedicated to ensuring vulnerable members of our community have access to affordable housing in San Francisco and advocates for their right to keep it.
fullDescription: Bill Sorro Housing Program (BiSHoP) is dedicated to ensuring vulnerable members of our community have access to affordable housing in San Francisco and advocates for their right to keep it.
